text: This place is very good to visit and it is very quiet. In the early morning and in the evening you can come here for biking, jogging or just relaxing walks. There is also a canal connecting from the Kalang river, where you can fish and see the wildlife found in this river such as herons, storks and if you are lucky you will see a family of wild otters looking for fish in the canal.

Nothing special, not much landscape works, this is a bare minimum PCN but conveniently connects you from MacPherson area to downtown Kallang.

If you are cycling üö¥‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è you will have to push your bicycle over the pedestrian bridge over PIE

A quiet place to go, kallang river has rich biodiversity, various fishes, monitor lizard, great heron, sometimes kingfisher can be seen. Walking, cycling, jogging, up to you. The PCN here is very close to central area,  thus I suggest go by bicycle to enjoy the night scene at marina bay, feel the cooling wind, you will have a good sleep.
All nice and good until.... You reach this bridge. At least they built the little blue path for Cyclists to roll up your bicycle.
Nice place for jogging and cycling
